CLUE: Texans sometimes wear hats to hold ten of them
FOUND IN: Ten-gallon hat: Originally worn by cowboys, this wide-brimmed hat could conceivably "hold" a symbolic representation of ten gallons (or ten items).
Enzyme: A protein molecule that acts as a biological catalyst, speeding up chemical reactions in living organisms without being consumed by the reaction itself.
Inquisitive: Showing curiosity or eagernes, like a keen learner.
